sentences.en: Car firms are desperate to achieve economies of scale.
sentences.cn: 汽车厂商拼命想要实现规模经济。

sentences.en: Frances achieved very good exam results.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西丝考试取得了优异成绩。

sentences.en: Hang in there and you never know what you might achieve.
sentences.cn: 坚持下去，你永远都无法预料会有什么样的收获。

sentences.en: He believed in political activism to achieve justice.
sentences.cn: 他相信通过政治激进主义可以赢得正义。

sentences.en: He may not always achieve greatness but at least he's a trier.
sentences.cn: 他也许并非总能成就大事，但至少他竭尽所能。

sentences.en: He was extremely devious in his efforts to achieve his heart's desire.
sentences.cn: 他在设法得到自己的中意之物时会不择手段。

sentences.en: I asked McKeown if the reunion was meant to achieve closure.
sentences.cn: 我问麦基翁重聚是不是为了寻求解脱。

sentences.en: I'm highly unsympathetic to what you are trying to achieve.
sentences.cn: 我极不赞成你试图达成的目标。

sentences.en: If competition is the best way to achieve it, then, fine.
sentences.cn: 如果竞争是达到目标的最佳方式，那就这么着吧。

sentences.en: It had been an uphill struggle to achieve what she had wanted.
sentences.cn: 她历尽坎坷才达到目的。

sentences.en: She eventually achieved her goal of becoming a professor.
sentences.cn: 她终于实现目标，当上了教授。

sentences.en: Some people unluckily achieve suicide when they only meant to attempt it.
sentences.cn: 一些人只是想尝试一下自杀，但却不幸真的身亡了。

sentences.en: Sometimes, that standard is quite difficult, if not impossible, to achieve.
sentences.cn: 有时即便有可能达到那个标准，那也是非常困难。

sentences.en: The ads helped Nike to achieve iconic status.
sentences.cn: 这些广告帮助耐克公司成就了其偶像地位。

sentences.en: There are many who will work hard to achieve these goals.
sentences.cn: 有志之士将会共同为实现这些目标而努力。

sentences.en: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.--Paulo Coelho
sentences.cn: 世界上只有一样东西可以阻止梦想实现，那就是害怕失败。

sentences.en: Wilson has achieved considerable success as an artist.
sentences.cn: 威尔逊作为一名艺术家成就斐然。

sentences.en: Women have yet to achieve wage or occupational parity in many fields.
sentences.cn: 女性在很多领域还没能争取到薪金、职位方面的平等。

words.tran_cn: 可完成的；可有成就的；做得成的

trans.tran_en: to successfully complete something or get a good result, especially by working hard
to successfully complete something or get a good result, especially by working hard
